itemInfo.itemDesc: A crop that was Processed to increase its marketability. It can be sold to Traders.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Crafted using a Workbench.

item.name: Pepper
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Grilled Sausage, Seafood Pasta, Meat Soup, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Pepper Seeds in a Garden.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
